channel.title: Rough Remake of the Glowing Energy Sword [CUSTOM]
channel.description:
Yeah well sorry I didn't have enough time to finish it but its as close as I could get.
[IMG]http://i438.photobucket.com/albums/qq110/Mason_013/GlowingEnergySword.jpg[/img]

item.title: Rough Remake of the Glowing Energy Sword [CUSTOM]
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

ak226688:

It looks quite good but i think the two sides arnt the same size one looks a little bigger and the colours look to dark.

Its just the rendering that Metaseq took :\

item.title: Rough Remake of the Glowing Energy Sword [CUSTOM]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:11, topic:284330”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=375789.msg2832786#msg2832786 date=1245465056]

[quote author=pkakidjr1 link=topic=375789.msg2832750#msg2832750 date=1245463414]

[quote author=ak226688 link=topic=375789.msg2832520#msg2832520 date=1245453925]

sorry but it looks realy bad it dosent even look like its glowing i dont actuly think you could improve only start again , sorry just my opinion.
[/quote]Off topic: Maybe you should grow a dick and a pair of balls and grow up, and stop being an ass…

On topic: Looks good, try editing it a bit more and change the colors a tad bit and you’re good to go
[/quote]wow are u trying to start a flame war?
[/quote]Nope, because flame wars are for immature childish niggers like you.

yea im gonna report you, kinda annoying to see words like these around the boards. And as for childish, (im gonna let you figure out who the real child is here…)

coon you got to remember the ages on this forums there are alot of kids on here that are just tryign to look “cool” insted they just get pissed off and cry like the little babys they are. reason the people flame is all these kids on here thinking there cool cause they leeched something and posted it calling it there own then they complan about it. lolz but anyways yes he needs banned.[/quote]
@OFFTOPIC - Yea, but the word has spread about Moparscape. We will be getting [b]ALOT of people like him, (not to mention there is alot more in the server sections than we have here). I, personally, am only able to keep my cool because of my life and how it is. Ive been thrown around by my parents and stuff, so little, as i call them, “Wanna-be-Noobs” are basically a peice of dust in my life.

@ONTOPIC - Yea the sword isnt bad at all, i dont much like the color though.

Read full topic
